backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing access‑controlled user profiles and quiz storage with queries for questions, chunks, and quiz metadata.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing removal of the software‑update banner and listing affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map summarizing key frontend files, including styling, quiz logic, editors, gameplay, and update‑banner removal.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment configuration for translation API and backend canister ID setup.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind‑based global theme defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark modes plus mobile safe‑area insets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that forces dark mode, loads runtime env.json before React, and mounts the app.
frontend/public/env.json: Runtime environment file containing an empty backend canister ID placeholder.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling auth, profile loading, view switching, diagnostics, stopped‑canister detection, and quiz/editor navigation.
frontend/src/components/BuildIdentityFoo: Footer showing build version, timestamp, and deployment ID.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentDiagno: Diagnostics UI providing error logs, health checks, runtime env inspection, and publish‑checklist tooling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling auth state and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/PendingUpdateBan: Placeholder banner component that currently renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form for entering and saving a user's name, then calling onComplete after profile creation.
frontend/src/config/index.ts: Configures and creates backend actors with dynamic IDL loading, agent setup, and environment-based host selection.
frontend/src/config/translation.ts: Implements a translation helper that forwards requests to a configurable or fallback translation API.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackupRestore.ts: Provides backup export and restore functions using the backend's state APIs with validation and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useExportAllQuestions: Exports all quiz questions and metadata by fetching quiz IDs and assembling full quiz data from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login flow, stored identities, and provides an authentication context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePendingUpdate.ts: Detects when a new build is available by comparing stored and current build IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/usePressHold.ts: Tracks press-and-hold interactions with pointer and keyboard events and returns press state with handlers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, quizzes, question counts, and questions via an actor API with error diagnostics.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuestionTranslatio: Custom hook providing cached async translation for text with state tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuizRecovery.ts: Hook to copy questions from one quiz to another and invalidate related React Query caches with recovery state tracking.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React, React Query, and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/quiz/adaptiveScheduler.ts: Implements an adaptive scheduling algorithm managing question order, repeat logic, mastery, and spacing rules.
frontend/src/quiz/BackupRestorePanel.tsx: UI panel to export quiz data to a JSON file and restore from a selected backup with confirmation and status handling.
frontend/src/quiz/blockUtils.ts: Utility functions for handling 100‑question block ranges, labels, indexing, and extraction.
frontend/src/quiz/draftStorage.ts: Handles saving, loading, validating, and clearing quiz drafts in localStorage using versioned serialization.
frontend/src/quiz/imageUtils.ts: Provides JPEG validation, file-to-bytes conversion, preview URL creation, and ExternalBlob helpers.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/PdfImportPre: Empty placeholder file for PDF import preview UI.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/pdfImportTyp: Empty placeholder for PDF import type definitions.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/pdfTextExtra: Empty placeholder for PDF text extraction logic.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/questionExtr: Empty placeholder for parsing extracted PDF text into quiz questions.
frontend/src/quiz/PreGameQuestionCountVi: View for choosing the number of questions before starting a quiz, including validation, slider selection, and loading states.
frontend/src/quiz/PreQuizSummaryView.tsx: Screen summarizing selected block and question count before starting a quiz with validation and navigation controls.
frontend/src/quiz/QuestionImagePicker.ts: Component allowing JPG image upload, preview, validation, and removal for quiz questions with progress tracking.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizEditor.tsx: Large editor component for creating, validating, importing, exporting, and managing quiz questions with recovery, backup, and block utilities.
frontend/src/quiz/quizFlowDiagnostics.ts: Implements optional quiz-flow debugging logs controlled via localStorage flags.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizGameplay.tsx: Runs the quiz flow including block selection, question count, adaptive scheduling, translation, and answer handling.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizResults.tsx: Displays final quiz results with score, wrong answer count, and actions to replay or review mistakes.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizScoreBar.tsx: Fixed bottom bar showing current correct and answered question counts.
frontend/src/quiz/randomSubset.ts: Provides a Fisher-Yates shuffle and random index subset generator.
frontend/src/quiz/sessionTypes.ts: Defines interfaces for tracking per-question performance and overall session state.
frontend/src/quiz/TroubleshootingPanel.t: Expandable panel showing quiz metadata, question counts, and warnings for troubleshooting data issues.
frontend/src/quiz/types.ts: Re-exports Question and QuizId types from the backend.
frontend/src/quiz/validation.ts: Validates quiz questions for required content, answer counts, and correct-answer indexing.
frontend/src/quiz/WrongAnswersReview.tsx: Scrollable view listing all incorrectly answered questions with a back button and escape‑key support.
frontend/src/quiz/wrongAnswerTypes.ts: Defines the WrongAnswerEntry type for wrong-answer review.
frontend/src/types/env.d.ts: Type declarations for Vite environment variables and window-provided env JSON.
frontend/src/utils/actorConnectionInfo.t: Resolves backend canister connection info, determining host, canister ID, and network.
frontend/src/utils/buildStamp.ts: Generates build metadata including version, timestamps, deployment ID, and stable build ID.
Resolves backend canister ID from multiple prioritized sources with detailed tracking.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Collects, stores, and formats deployment-related diagnostic errors with environment context.
frontend/src/utils/formatPublishChecklis: Generates a formatted publish checklist string using build and canister connection info.
frontend/src/utils/liveReadiness.ts: Evaluates deployment readiness based on canister ID resolution and backend health checks.
frontend/src/utils/quizExport.ts: Provides quiz export helpers including JSON download and timestamped filename generation.
Performs a hard refresh by clearing storage, unregistering service workers, clearing caches, and reloading with cache-busting.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeEnvStatus.ts: Inspects env.json loading status and CANISTER_ID_BACKEND presence to diagnose runtime config issues.
frontend/src/utils/shareLiveVerification: Builds a detailed live verification report including build details, canister info, and health check results.
frontend/src/utils/stateSnapshotJson.ts: Serializes and deserializes full state snapshots with ExternalBlob handling and basic validation.
frontend/src/utils/stoppedCanisterDetect: Detects stopped-canister errors, extracts canister IDs, formats messages, and provides recovery steps.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routes), storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and clearing them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom themes, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project's state, features, and requests related to removing the software update pop-up.
